4 Conclusion As a summary, cotton fabrics with superhydrophobicity were successfully fabricated by a simple approach of sol–gel, TiO2 film prepared by four times dip-coating owns surface roughness R a =8.24μm and exhibits superhydrophobicity with a contact angle of 151° after being surface modified with ODT.
